info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 11:58AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN GREENE... SOUTHWESTERN FAYETTE...NORTHERN MONONGALIA AND MARION COUNTIES THROUGH 1245 PM EDT... At 1158 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mannington, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Morgantown, Fairmont, Westover, Mannington, Star City, Barrackville, Point Marion, Granville, Fairview, Brookhaven, Cassville, and Rivesville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 68 in West Virginia between mile markers 1 and 9. Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania near mile marker 0. Interstate 79 in West Virginia between mile markers 146 and 160. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
